author: ShortCircuit
description:
Shout out to RIDGE for sponsoring this video! Check them out at https://Ridge.com/ShortCircuit and grab something from their Holiday Sale event!

Do you ever wish your mouse was more like a controller? Well the Swiftpoint Z2 is here and it does it ALL! Gyro controllers, analog buttons, customizable macros and something like 9 different buttons. Click, rotate, and tilt away!
